Hint: Welcome to our game prototype. Try to explore the map to solve the puzzles. The clues will lead you to open the final GATE. Hope you enjoy!

That's the DIARY OF PRINCESS! You can access it through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 1 on keyboard.
Press left mouse to pick up or interact with items.
This chest is locked. A 6 number password is needed.
You can access the MAGNIFIER through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 2 on keyboard.
You can access the SHADER through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 3 on keyboard.
